tr.td: No active disease symptoms but less fit than category 1
Medical problems are well controlled, but not regularly active
Not dependent for daily help, but symptoms limit activities
Need help with high order IADLs (finances, transportation, heavy housework)
Need help with all outside activities and some housekeeping
Completely dependent, approaching end of life
Approaching the end of life (life expectancy <6 months)

tr.td: Pale white; always burns, never tans
White; usually burns, tans with difficulty
Cream white; sometimes mild burn, gradually tans

Dark brown; very rarely burns, tans very easily
Deeply pigmented dark brown to black; never burns, tans very easily
